scripts.lint:xano: LINT_FILES=$(git ls-files -m -o --exclude-standard apis functions addons tables tasks | grep '\\.xs$' || true); if [ -z "$LINT_FILES" ]; then echo 'No .xs changes to lint'; else NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-specifier-resolution=node npx xs-lint --server /workspace/.vscode/extensions/xano.xanoscript/extension/language-server/server.js $LINT_FILES; fi
scripts.check: npm run lint:xano && npm run test:api
